generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a forward-pointing arrow, indicating it is a road for vehicular traffic.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian area on the right side of the road, bordered by metal bike racks and trees, is clearly visible as a sidewalk.
- building: Modern buildings with glass and concrete facades are visible on both sides of the street, particularly on the right.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are present along the sidewalks and in the background, indicating vegetation.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing blue with some clouds.
- person: A person wearing a red shirt is walking across the road, and two other people are standing on the sidewalk to the left.
- car: A black car is partially visible on the left side of the image, occupying the foreground.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the distance, parked on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the bike racks.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the bike racks.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the road, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on a pole on the left side of the road, near the pedestrian crossing.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- fence: A temporary fence with red and white stripes is visible on the left side of the road, near the pedestrian crossing.
